mapper.select: SELECT m.no, crew_no crewNo, user_no userNo, role, report_num reportNum, profile_img profileImg, introduction, type, m.regdate,cover_img coverImg, name FROM crew_members m, crews c WHERE m.user_no=#{no} AND m.crew_no = c.no ORDER BY 9
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crew_members(no, CREW_NO, USER_NO, ROLE, REPORT_NUM, PROFILE_IMG, INTRODUCTION, TYPE, regdate) VALUES(crew_members_seq.nextval, #{crewNo}, #{userNo}, #{role}, #{reportNum},#{profileImg},#{introduction},#{type}, systimestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT c.no, crew_no crewNo,user_no userNo , role, report_num reportNum, profile_img profileImg, introduction, type, c.regdate, u.name FROM crew_members c, users u WHERE c.user_no = u.no AND c.no = #{no}
SELECT PROFILE_IMG profileImg FROM crew_members WHERE crew_no = #{no} AND type='W' ORDER BY user_no
